wikitext.*:
'''WĀ''' (WAWA, WAIWA) is an [[Elvish]] [[Sundocarme|root]] signifying "blow; sound of, noise of wind".<ref name=Ety397>{{LR|Etymologies}}, p. 397</ref><ref>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 189</ref>

==Derivatives==

*[[Quenya]]: ''[[waiwa]] > vaiwa'' ("wind")<ref name=Ety397/>
*[[Noldorin]] ([[Sindarin]]): ''[[gwaew]]'' ("wind")<ref name=Ety397/>
*[[Ilkorin]]: ''[[gwau]]'' ("wind")<ref name=Ety397/>

==See also==

*Root [[AWA]]

==Other versions of the legendarium==

In the ''Qenya Lexicon'' appears the root GWĀ-, with the [[Qenya]] derivative ''wā'' ("wind").<ref>{{PE|12}}</ref>
